comments.author: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.text:
> I'm missing a justification (t)here...
That's the current policy for mozilla-central. I think one rationale is that it makes it easier for tests to get accepted into various standards conformance test suites.

comments.author: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.creator: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
q.v. Bug 629514 Comment 6
Before we change the copyrights and headers we need permission from contributors who are not MoCo/MoMo employees (or contractors). If we just copied the tests from Firefox we can fix each test based on what Firefox does with their version.
comments.text:
q.v. Bug 629514 Comment 6
Before we change the copyrights and headers we need permission from contributors who are not MoCo/MoMo employees (or contractors). If we just copied the tests from Firefox we can fix each test based on what Firefox does with their version.

comments.author: sdwilsh@forerunnerdesigns.com
comments.creator: sdwilsh@forerunnerdesigns.com
comments.raw_text:
We don't need to change existing tests; the panorama team decided they wanted to, however.

See also, https://www.mozilla.org/MPL/license-policy.html
